name: Strapi
description: Use the Strapi CMS to manage your content.
nextSteps:
cd ../server
npm install
npm run develop
Create an admin at http://localhost:1337/admin
Go to Content Manager > Article and publish articles

args: cd .. && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/strapi/strapi-cloud-template-blog.git server && cd server && rm -rf .git .yarnrc.yml yarn.lock && cp .env.example .env
